question: Who has been conferred with Lifetime Achievement Award by Euromoney?
explanation:
The MD of HDFC Bank Aditya Puri has been conferred the Lifetime Achievement Award by Euromoney Awards of Excellence 2020.
This award has been conferred to recognise the leader for his skills in building a world-class Indian bank. This prestigious award has been given by Euro Money just ahead of Aditya Puriâ€™s retirement next month.
